title: Power line insulators for voltages exeeding 750
abstract: A Sectional Committee, working under the procedure of the American Standards Association and with the joint sponsorship of the National Electrical Manufacturers Association, recently submitted to the sponsors for approval “Standards for Insulator Tests and Ratings.” This report is in the nature of a revision of the present A. I. E. E. Standard No. 41, Insulator Test Specifications which has been the basis of the committee's work. Following approval of both sponsors, (A. I. E. E. Director's approval obtained March 14), it will be submitted to A. S. A. for final action and will then become available in printed form.
